one_reviews_text: please fix the touch for more immersion.. great game

Support of the Touch Controller are not work.
The only button of the Touch Controller that do his job is the "Oculus" Button on the right one.
A bit confusing to figure out what to do but a unique experience worth trying out if you like being surprised....over...and over.
Normaly i have no big problem with it but here its extreme... More then 5 Minutes was not possible for me...

I really enjoyed this game. FNAF was an alrightish game so I was skeptic at first, but this one is completely different since it's in VR. This game honestly scares me even today (while knowing what to do and when), and it's always a pleasure to watch friends or family attempt when they visit. Great game when playing myself, even better when watching others try.
Great game but it killed my grandpa when he tried to play. Had a heart attack RIP.
... and moving around ist Horror. Not a good feeling.
Scary, original, but the graphics could be better, and the positional tracking needs an upgrade NOW
Decent enough scares and atmosphere, but doesn't appear to have any positional tracking, which makes it no better than a mobile title, and for the nausea-prone like myself, unplayable.

It's a good game for the price.

But Emily can go f*** right off.
